title: Custom Made Router Table by Dean Santner
item_description:
Custom Made Router Table by Dean Santner

Forklift Loading Fee of $50. This forklift loading fee is mandatory and must be paid in cash to the Seller on-site during the removal period.

  • Manufacturer: Dean Santner
  • Width: 24”
  • Length: 77”
  • Height: 35 1/2”
  • Approximate Weight: 400 Lbs
  • Contents Note: This Machine Will Only Come With The Routers On It And Tooling That Is I The Routers. Feeder Is Sold Separately.
  • Custom made router table by Dean Santner
  • Rockwell delta pin router direct drive motor serial number 43-503. 20000 rpm 208v single phase.
  • Hydronic raising and lowering for router.
  • Housed in a sound proof cabinet.
  • converted to run as a router table.
  • Has a an extra dewalt router at the end of table.
